short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your URL and look at the again after!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to save webpage links so that you can view them later. It only uses your computer's local memory. It is never connected to an external server. It does not save any of your personal information.
